title: Career Opportunities After BCA
author: Prabhleen Singh
headline: Exploring diverse career paths after completing a Bachelor in Computer Applications in 2025.
content:
A Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) opens up numerous career opportunities in the IT and tech world. Graduates can explore fields such as software development, web design, data science, and cyber security.

Course Details

  • Duration: 3 Years
  • Level: Undergraduate
  • Start Date: Year Round

Career Paths

Software Developer

Create and maintain software applications, focusing on coding, debugging, and deployment.

Web Developer

Design and develop engaging and interactive websites.

Data Analyst

Analyze data to help organizations make informed decisions.

Cyber Security Specialist

Protect digital infrastructure from cyber threats.

System Administrator

Manage IT infrastructure and ensure systems operate efficiently.

Cloud Architect

Design cloud-based solutions for businesses.
